headline: Power Conditioning Units Lead Growth in Cryocooler Hardware Segment
summary: The cryocooler market, valued at USD 3.48 billion in 2025, is projected to hit USD 4.90 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 7.1%. Key growth drivers include satellite launches, defense applications, and advancements in quantum computing and medical imaging. The power conditioning unit segment is set to grow at the highest CAGR, crucial for stable power in sensitive cryogenic systems. Pulse-tube cryocoolers, vital for space applications, dominate the market. The closed-loop cycle segment also sees si
